name: ATRIUM
description:
As Caesar continues is line of conquest around Gaul, the stories of his battles echoes all the way to rome as songs, painting and games. In this great time of expansion a tournament is organised. The patricians will honor his victories by playing the now famous game of "ATRIUM"

The purpose of the game is to create the biggest empire. You will need to own roads and castles without forgetting to attack other players.

This builder placement game allow you to evolve your builders to a powerfull army and can be played up to 4 players on the same computer.
